study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: We examine the impact of the TPA program on the entry of firms... agricultural output... public services, such as health and education
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: We find that compared with nontreated counties, fixed-asset investment in poor counties increased significantly by 9.3 percent after implementation

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Of the various policies implemented by the TPA program, industrial support, agricultural development, and public service improvement are the core poverty alleviation measures in the national key poor counties
evidence_citations.country_citation: the recent poverty alleviation program in China
